\documentclass{article}
\usepackage{natbib}

\begin{document}

\section{Introduction}
% Test standard \cite command
This paper discusses examples \cite{smith2020}.

% Test \citep (parenthetical citation)
Several works explore this topic \citep{jones2021}.

% Test \citet (textual citation)
\citet{brown2019} introduced the concept.

% Test multiple citations in one command
See also \cite{smith2020, preprint2022}.

% This is a comment - citations here should be IGNORED: \cite{should_be_ignored}
% \citep{also_ignored}

% Test citation with optional argument
According to \cite[Chapter 3]{textbook2018}, this is important.

% Test citation with pre and post notes
As noted by \citep[see][p.~42]{smith2020}, examples are useful.

\end{document}
